alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:17PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Custer, Perkins and Lincoln Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
